txt.en: 'It seems that crafty cat has finally met its match! Good work. Ready for your next challenge?'

'Next, I suggest you track down the notorious chicken-thief, Snowfell the Lynx. She is quite the successful hunter, with many children. Unfortunately for her, Lynx furs are quite valuable, and the people of Dale would like to keep their chickens. She will be harder to find than Fenskin, but the pay is good.'
Mountain lynxes and Snowfell can be found on the slopes of Erebor.\n\nYou should hunt mountain lynxes and Snowfell.
Rékar the Huntsman can be found in Dale.\n\nYou should talk to Rékar.
Rékar the Huntsman has challenged you to bring down some well-known beasts in the Dale-lands.
